column5: The truck & boat are all washed, waxed, loaded and ready to roll at sunrise tomorrow morning. This'll be about my 8th year at Lakair on the West Arm of Nipissing and we spend about 3 weeks a year up there.  The muskies can be tempermental at times and do a good job of hiding deep in the weeds, but with alot of effort they can be dug out. My last trip up there was 10 months ago when I was able to get these 3 pretty ladies.  I know where these girls hang out and hopefully their Momma's will be there  too.  I don't bother posting many fishing reports anymore but if the Nipissing musky Gods smile on me next week I may just write one up

You have a super time up there Lew. Find big momma and give her a hug for me. Looking forward to a LEW report.  I see those three biggies were caught casting.  Once you know your water, casting's the way.
See you tomorrow Lew.  We're all packed and ready, planning on arriving noonish tomorrow  I'm hoping one day you and Paul can do a morning fish so I can sleep in
Good luck Lew (like you would need it for catching muskie)! Hope you catch the big Momma's!
Have fun all glad to see you ready to take it to them .   Art
Don,t forget,,,,,,,,,,,,,,YOUR LEADERS,,,,,,,,,,,  Have a great time bud.
Those 3 fish all beat my pb muskie! Lol.  Good luck and I hope to see a report when you get back Lew!
Hope Nip is kind to you this year, lew.
Thanks folks, I'm looking forward to a great trip.  And Joey, you tell Paul it'll be my pleasure

Will do Lew, and thanks.  He's on afternoons right now, which is why we are not leaving at the crack of dawn, he will need some sleep, although he probably won't be able to from the excitement of going
Ya'll better hurry up.  sure is nice up here.
Good to see you made it safely Rich, we should roll in around 10:30-11:00  And why are you on a computer and not out fishing ??
Don't worry about the report Lew - just go up and have a great time!  Ahhh who am I kidding - I'd love to see some west arm beauties when you get back.
good luck lew hope you get some slime
Good luck Lew. I hope the musky are hungry and we get to see some pics.
Have a great time guys wish we could have been there
Got get her Lew.   I hope you have a blast.
Smiling on the inside in every one.
I just might pop in .
Good luck, and don't forget to smile!
Hope you have a fantastic weekend Lew and everyone else headed up to Lakair ! esp hope you get a beast that knocks those other muskies in your photos, down a notch or two
Good luck, some great fish.
